I

IllegalConfigurationException - Exception in eu.stratosphere.nephele.template
An IllegalConfigurationException is thrown when the user has configured job vertices in a way that either conflicts with the expected usage of the respective task of the configuration of the Nephele framework.
IllegalConfigurationException(String) - Constructor for exception eu.stratosphere.nephele.template.IllegalConfigurationException
Constructs an new illegal configuration exception with the given error message.
IllegalConfigurationException(String, Throwable) - Constructor for exception eu.stratosphere.nephele.template.IllegalConfigurationException
Constructs an new illegal configuration exception with the given error message and a given cause.
includeConfiguration(Configuration) - Static method in class eu.stratosphere.nephele.configuration.GlobalConfiguration
Merges the given Configuration object into the global configuration.
initialize(URI) - Method in class eu.stratosphere.nephele.fs.file.LocalFileSystem
Called after a new FileSystem instance is constructed.
initialize(URI) - Method in class eu.stratosphere.nephele.fs.FileSystem
Called after a new FileSystem instance is constructed.
initializeCompressors() - Method in interface eu.stratosphere.nephele.io.OutputGate
Initializes the compression objects inside the input channels attached to this gate.
initializeDecompressors() - Method in interface eu.stratosphere.nephele.io.InputGate
Initializes the decompressor objects inside the input channels attached to this gate.
INPUT_PATH_CONFIG_KEY - Static variable in class eu.stratosphere.nephele.template.AbstractFileInputTask
 
InputGate<T extends Record> - Interface in eu.stratosphere.nephele.io
In Nephele input gates are a specialization of general gates and connect input channels and record readers.
InputSplit - Interface in eu.stratosphere.nephele.template
This interface must be implemented by all kind of input splits that can be assigned to Nephele's input vertices.
InputSplitIterator<T extends InputSplit> - Class in eu.stratosphere.nephele.template
The input split iterator allows an AbstractInputTask to iterator over all input splits it is supposed to consume.
InputSplitIterator(InputSplitProvider) - Constructor for class eu.stratosphere.nephele.template.InputSplitIterator
Constructs a new input split iterator.
InputSplitProvider - Interface in eu.stratosphere.nephele.template
An input split provider can be successively queried to provide a series of InputSplit objects an AbstractInputTask is supposed to consume in the course of its execution.
IntegerRecord - Class in eu.stratosphere.nephele.types
This class represents record for integer values.
IntegerRecord(int) - Constructor for class eu.stratosphere.nephele.types.IntegerRecord
Constructs a new integer record with the given integer value.
IntegerRecord() - Constructor for class eu.stratosphere.nephele.types.IntegerRecord
Constructs an empty integer record (Mainly used for serialization, do not call this constructor in your program).
IntegerTaskEvent - Class in eu.stratosphere.nephele.event.task
This class provides a simple implementation of an event that holds an integer value.
IntegerTaskEvent(int) - Constructor for class eu.stratosphere.nephele.event.task.IntegerTaskEvent
Constructs a new integer task event.
integerToByteArray(int, byte[], int) - Static method in class eu.stratosphere.nephele.util.NumberUtils
Serializes and writes the given integer number to the provided byte array.

Checks if this output gate operates in broadcast mode, i.e. all records passed to it are transferred through all connected output channels.
